item.title: Features
item.description: Features Supports hardware and software time stamping via the Linux SO_TIMESTAMPING socket option. Supports the Linux PTP Hardware Clock (PHC) subsystem by using the clock_gettime family of calls, including the clock_adjtimex system call. Implements Boundary Clock (BC), Ordinary Clock (OC) and Transparent Clock (TC). Transport over UDP/IPv4, UDP/IPv6, and raw Ethernet (Layer 2). Supports IEEE 802.1AS-2011 in the role of end station.
